pages.text: That gemstone table I've been working with is able to be improved, with all three shards and a pinch of that blue powder my flowers have granted me. But to what end? Further experimentation, particularly related to my ideas about creating life, is in order.

pages.title: Pigment
pages.text: This is color in its purest form, and harbors latent energy within. Such a resource will be invaluable, I'm sure of that.
